item.title: Abandoned bike skeleton using up bike rack space - outside IDM Estates New North Road N1, 24th August
item.description:
Abandoned blue bike with no back wheel, brakes or pedals taking up a bike rack parking space outside; IDM Estates Office B, West Gainsborough 1 Poole Street, London N1 5EA Dangerous to pedestrians as rusted with sharp edges sticking out. Please remove.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Poole Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Please clean graffiti on telecoms box., 24th August
item.description:
The graffiti on the box needs cleaning, located on Chesham Avenue next to the wall of 212 Crescent Drive.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chesham Avenue, Petts Wood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: You have placed one bin by Starbucks which gets OVERFLOWING and rubbish flys down Shad Thames every day. There is litter for no reason on our road. Yet there is another bin positioned a bit further away which is empty because it is not in peoples pathway., 24th August
item.description:
Put TWO bins together so that rubbish is not overflowing into the street. There is two bins on that bit of the road. The other way isn't used because the two bins need to be together. Simple solution. I'm tired of seeing Shad Thames look terrible because you can't see that one bin isn't enough for the sheer number of tourists!! This is not hard to resolve

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18-20, Shad Thames, Bermondsey, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lots of litter around the recycling centre at Shortlands station, 24th August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shortlands Road, Shortlands, London

item.title: Several large potholes, 24th August
item.description:
